title: 'Love Actually': Keira Knightley, Hugh Grant, Liam Neeson return in new clip
text:
'Love Actually': Keira Knightley, Hugh Grant, Liam Neeson return in new clip Maeve McDermott , USATODAY 12:00 p.m. ET March 22, 2017 1 Shares 
The new trailer for Love Actually 's TV reunion has arrived and, finally, it provides an update on many of our favorite stars from the 2003 original. 
Before the cast reunites for the 10-minute sketch, part of NBC and Comic Relief's "Red Nose Day Special" on May 24, original cast members including Hugh Grant, Keira Knightley, Rowan Atkinson, Liam Neeson and Bill Nighy gathered for an expanded preview, holding up the original film's signature cards. 
After several stars flash handwritten notes to tease the special, Knightley, Grant and Neeson use their notes for a more nobler cause: roasting Colin Firth, who doesn't appear in the preview clip. 
Directing the mini-reunion of the romantic comedy is Richard Curtis, the writer-director of the original feature, who promised the sketch will be "very much in the spirit of the original film and of Red Nose Day." Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2mQpEXx Most Popular
